mapper.select: SELECT MODU_CODE, MODU_CNAME, MODU_TC, MODU_MODEL, MOD_NAME, REL_TABLE, REL_INFO FROM BP_MODULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND MODU_CODE = #{moduCode}

SELECT a.*, b.data_type FROM BP_ELEMENT a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CONCAT( tab_code, '.', col_code ) AS col_code, data_type,UI_ORDER,tab_code FROM bp_field ) b ON a.ele_ename = b.col_code WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.MODU_CODE = #{moduCode} ORDER BY a.UNIT_CODE,b.tab_code,b.UI_ORDER
SELECT COL_CODE, PK_GEN FROM BP_FIELD WHERE 1 = 1 AND TAB_CODE = #{tabCode} AND PK_GEN IS NOT NULL

SELECT a.*, b.col_name, b.data_type FROM BP_ELEMENT a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM bp_field WHERE tab_code IN ( SELECT rel_table FROM BP_MODULE WHERE MODU_CODE = #{moduCode} ) ) b ON a.ele_ename = b.col_code WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.MODU_CODE = #{moduCode} ORDER BY a.UNIT_CODE ,b.UI_ORDER

SELECT MODU_CODE, MODU_CNAME, MODU_TC, REL_TABLE, C.COL_CODE, C.PK_GEN FROM BP_MODULE a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM BP_FIELD WHERE PK_GEN IS NOT NULL ) C ON A.REL_TABLE = C.TAB_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND MODU_CODE = #{moduCode}
SELECT * FROM BP_SYSTEMS WHERE 1 = 1 AND SYS_KEY LIKE CONCAT(#{sysKey},'%')
SELECT * FROM BP_SYSTEMS WHERE 1 = 1 AND SYS_KEY=#{sysKey}
SELECT * FROM bp_transaction WHERE SUBSTR( nod_code, 1, 3 ) IN ( SELECT rel_info FROM BP_MODULE WHERE modu_code = #{moduCode}) AND tran_code!=''
SELECT * FROM BP_SYSTEMS WHERE mod_code IN (SELECT tran_code FROM bp_transaction WHERE SUBSTR(nod_code, 1, 3) IN (SELECT rel_info FROM BP_MODULE WHERE modu_code = #{moduCode}) AND tran_code != '')
